verses.verse: But now <WH6258> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> that created <WH1254> thee, O Jacob, <WH3290> and he that formed <WH3335> thee, O Israel, <WH3478> Fear <WH3372> not: <WH408> for <WH3588> I have redeemed <WH1350> thee, I have called <WH7121> thee by thy name; <WH8034> thou <WH859> art mine.

When <WH3588> thou passest through <WH5674> the waters, <WH4325> I <WH589> will be with <WH854> thee; and through the rivers, <WH5104> they shall not <WH3808> overflow <WH7857> thee: when <WH3588> thou walkest <WH1980> through <WH1119> the fire, <WH784> thou shalt not <WH3808> be burned; <WH3554> neither <WH3808> shall the flame <WH3852> kindle <WH1197> upon thee.

For <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel, <WH3478> thy Savior: <WH3467> I gave <WH5414> Egypt <WH4714> for thy ransom, <WH3724> Ethiopia <WH3568> and Seba <WH5434> for <WH8478> thee.

Since <WH4480> <WH834> thou wast precious <WH3365> in my sight, <WH5869> thou hast been honorable, <WH3513> and I <WH589> have loved <WH157> thee: therefore will I give <WH5414> men <WH120> for <WH8478> thee, and people <WH3816> for <WH8478> thy life. <WH5315>

Fear <WH3372> not: <WH408> for <WH3588> I <WH589> am with <WH854> thee: I will bring <WH935> thy seed <WH2233> from the east, <WH4480> <WH4217> and gather <WH6908> thee from the west; <WH4480> <WH4628>

I will say <WH559> to the north, <WH6828> Give up; <WH5414> and to the south, <WH8486> Keep not back: <WH3607> <WH408> bring <WH935> my sons <WH1121> from far, <WH4480> <WH7350> and my daughters <WH1323> from the ends <WH4480> <WH7097> of the earth; <WH776>
Even every one <WH3605> that is called <WH7121> by my name: <WH8034> for I have created <WH1254> him for my glory, <WH3519> I have formed <WH3335> him; yea, <WH637> I have made <WH6213> him.
Bring forth <WH3318> the blind <WH5787> people <WH5971> that have <WH3426> eyes, <WH5869> and the deaf <WH2795> that have ears. <WH241>

Let all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> be gathered <WH6908> together, <WH3162> and let the people <WH3816> be assembled: <WH622> who <WH4310> among them can declare <WH5046> this, <WH2063> and show <WH8085> us former things? <WH7223> let them bring forth <WH5414> their witnesses, <WH5707> that they may be justified: <WH6663> or let them hear, <WH8085> and say, <WH559> It is truth. <WH571>

Ye <WH859> are my witnesses, <WH5707> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> and my servant <WH5650> whom <WH834> I have chosen: <WH977> that <WH4616> ye may know <WH3045> and believe <WH539> me, and understand <WH995> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am he: <WH1931> before <WH6440> me there was no <WH3808> God <WH410> formed, <WH3335> neither <WH3808> shall there be <WH1961> after <WH310> me.
I, <WH595> even I, <WH595> am the LORD; <WH3068> and beside <WH4480> <WH1107> me there is no <WH369> savior. <WH3467>

I <WH595> have declared, <WH5046> and have saved, <WH3467> and I have showed, <WH8085> when there was no <WH369> strange <WH2114> god among you: therefore ye <WH859> are my witnesses, <WH5707> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> that I <WH589> am God. <WH410>

Yea, <WH1571> before the day <WH4480> <WH3117> was I <WH589> am he; <WH1931> and there is none <WH369> that can deliver <WH5337> out of my hand: <WH4480> <WH3027> I will work, <WH6466> and who <WH4310> shall let <WH7725> it?

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> your redeemer, <WH1350> the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel; <WH3478> For your sake <WH4616> I have sent <WH7971> to Babylon, <WH894> and have brought down <WH3381> all <WH3605> their nobles, <WH1281> and the Chaldeans, <WH3778> whose cry <WH7440> is in the ships. <WH591>
I <WH589> am the LORD, <WH3068> your Holy One, <WH6918> the creator <WH1254> of Israel, <WH3478> your King. <WH4428>
Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> which maketh <WH5414> a way <WH1870> in the sea, <WH3220> and a path <WH5410> in the mighty <WH5794> waters; <WH4325>

Which bringeth forth <WH3318> the chariot <WH7393> and horse, <WH5483> the army <WH2428> and the power; <WH5808> they shall lie down <WH7901> together, <WH3162> they shall not <WH1077> rise: <WH6965> they are extinct, <WH1846> they are quenched <WH3518> as tow. <WH6594>
Remember <WH2142> ye not <WH408> the former things, <WH7223> neither <WH408> consider <WH995> the things of old. <WH6931>

Behold, <WH2009> I will do <WH6213> a new thing; <WH2319> now <WH6258> it shall spring forth; <WH6779> shall ye not <WH3808> know <WH3045> it? I will even <WH637> make <WH7760> a way <WH1870> in the wilderness, <WH4057> and rivers <WH5104> in the desert. <WH3452>

The beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall honor <WH3513> me, the dragons <WH8565> and the owls: <WH1323> <WH3284> because <WH3588> I give <WH5414> waters <WH4325> in the wilderness, <WH4057> and rivers <WH5104> in the desert, <WH3452> to give drink <WH8248> to my people, <WH5971> my chosen. <WH972>
This <WH2098> people <WH5971> have I formed <WH3335> for myself; they shall show forth <WH5608> my praise. <WH8416>
But thou hast not <WH3808> called upon <WH7121> me, O Jacob; <WH3290> but <WH3588> thou hast been weary <WH3021> of me, O Israel. <WH3478>

Thou hast not <WH3808> brought <WH935> me the small cattle <WH7716> of thy burnt offerings; <WH5930> neither <WH3808> hast thou honored <WH3513> me with thy sacrifices. <WH2077> I have not <WH3808> caused thee to serve <WH5647> with an offering, <WH4503> nor <WH3808> wearied <WH3021> thee with incense. <WH3828>

Thou hast bought <WH7069> me no <WH3808> sweet cane <WH7070> with money, <WH3701> neither <WH3808> hast thou filled <WH7301> me with the fat <WH2459> of thy sacrifices: <WH2077> but <WH389> thou hast made me to serve <WH5647> with thy sins, <WH2403> thou hast wearied <WH3021> me with thine iniquities. <WH5771>
I, <WH595> even I, <WH595> am he <WH1931> that blotteth out <WH4229> thy transgressions <WH6588> for mine own sake, <WH4616> and will not <WH3808> remember <WH2142> thy sins. <WH2403>
Put me in remembrance: <WH2142> let us plead <WH8199> together: <WH3162> declare <WH5608> thou, <WH859> that <WH4616> thou mayest be justified. <WH6663>
Thy first <WH7223> father <WH1> hath sinned, <WH2398> and thy teachers <WH3887> have transgressed <WH6586> against me.
Therefore I have profaned <WH2490> the princes <WH8269> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> and have given <WH5414> Jacob <WH3290> to the curse, <WH2764> and Israel <WH3478> to reproaches. <WH1421>
